Node.definition: = to make an effort to hear the words spoken by someone else
a more or less fixed phrase: the heavens and the earth, equivalent to a single lexical item: the totality of God's creation

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= words spoken by humans and deities; often remembered and recorded
= an opening in the lower part of the face of humans and animals through which food and air are taken and vocal sounds are emitted
= water coming down from the sky, which is indispensable for sustaining human life, but can be both refreshing and destructive

= causative action by which humans and deities give verbal instruction to other humans, and by which the focus is on the communication of the message rather than the content of the message; ≈ often connoting persuasive or eloquent speech
= condensed moisture resulting from contact of air and cooler land surfaces; ►an important source of water for vegetation; ≈ regarded as refreshing, life enhancing; associated with fertility
= words spoken by humans and deities; often remembered and recorded
= shower of rain, ≈ regarded as a blessing
= a general term for plants, ► used as food by humans and animals; ≈ associated with frailty, but also with prosperity
= a brief and usually light fall of rain; ≈ regarded as a blessing
= any of various plants, herbs, grasses, seed bearing vegetation that can be consumed by human and/or animal
literally: name; hence: = the information that is generally known about a person or deity, which may either be good or bad and has a direct impact on the way this person or deity is regarded
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= action by which humans or deities speak with a loud voice, often to draw attention to themselves or to their situation and expecting someone to respond in one way or another
literally: to give (a quality); hence: = action by which humans publicly acknowledge one of the qualities of a deity
= state in which a human being or deity has an elevated status
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
figurative extension of a rock as place of refuge: = deity that protects and provides refuge
literally: road; hence: = pattern of behavior, with a primary focus on moral and ethical behavior, ◄ understood as a journey through life
= practices that conform to the laws of God
with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= state in which humans and deities are considered worthy of trust, because they are truthful and committed, with an unwavering disposition, which is reflected in their actions

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
= the state of being or acting in an unjust or morally evil way
= state in which a person's or deity's behavior is fully consistent with the requirements of the law, either in a specific matter that is under dispute or as one's general mode of behavior
= person whose behavior is morally and ethically right
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
literally: blemish, defect; hence: = state in which humans are guilty of misbehavior, which is a stain on their reputation
= all of the people born and living at about the same time
literally: to be crooked (of a person); hence: = state in which humans lack integrity in everything they think or do
= pertaining to being intent on outwitting, tricking, or deceiving other people
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
= action by which humans or deities act towards a person in a way that has consequences and can result either in retribution or a reward
= foolish person who has no respect for God or his fellow human beings but thinks highly of himself
= state in which humans, deities or animals have a certain level of wisdom, intelligence, or proficiency
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= a person, ◄ compared to a father, ► who is the originator of a certain process; ≈ said about God only
= causative action by which deities call humans or objects into existence
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them
= causative action by which humans or deities bring an object into existence

Node.gloss: to remember|to call to mind|to be mindful|to bear in mind|to consider
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities reprocess information that is stored in their mind
literally: days; hence: = an unspecified amount of time
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future

Node.gloss: to consider|to pay heed|to perceive|to realize|to understand|to distinguish
Node.definition: = process by which someone gains knowledge and understanding by observing carefully in order to see through the outward appearance of things and grasp their essence
= all of the people born and living at about the same time
= all of the people born and living at about the same time
= direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort
= a person who is nearing the end of a relatively long life; ≈ regarded as wise, worthy of respect, and an asset to the community

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= action by which humans or deities divide land and other possessions among (other) humans as their permanent possession, with special focus on the recipients and less on the object that is being divided
= an epithet for the God of Israel ◄ as the one who not only lives in the highest heavens but is also worthy of the highest honor

= a large body of people united by common descent, religion, or language, inhabiting a particular state or territory, led by one common leader; often referring to the non Israelite nations, especially when used in plural
= causative action by which humans or deities separate one or more (other) humans or animals from a larger group
= member of a larger group of related people or objects, ◄ referred to as a child of that larger group
= human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; sometimes explicitly subdivided between male (זָכָר) and female (נְקֵבָה) ≈ associated with mortality
= action by which deities come to a formal and authoritative decision about something and enforce it
= a set of limits that separates part of a whole from other parts, with focus either on the limits itself or on the area or object surrounded by it
= the quantity of a number of objects or the frequency of a number of events
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= someone with whom one has a close, affectionate, and exclusive relationship ◄ as if it were a private possession
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= man, also known as Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) ◄ second son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) ► one of the patriarchs of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) in poetic texts often used as a reference to the entire people of Israel
= object that is owned by someone else
= process by which humans or objects come upon (other) humans or objects without searching

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= area not very suitable for sedentary life and agriculture because of its lack of water; suitable for grazing domestic animals and only inhabited by nomadic tribes and wild animals
= location that is devoid of any life and without any structure or order
= process by which the wind makes a high pitched sound
= area without water and therefore without vegetation and settlers; sometimes taken as the name of one specific region
literally: to surround; hence: = causative action by which humans or deities provide protection to (other) humans

Node.gloss: to take care of|to watch over
Node.definition: = pattern of actions by which someone gives positive attention to someone else with the intention of making sure that no harm is done to that person

Node.gloss: to watch over|to guard|to be in charge of|to take care of|to protect|to tend|to keep
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities make sure that an object is safe from harm; ◄ by observing the object and the surrounding area carefully and intervening when necessary
= center part of iris of eye, ≈ associated with care as this is a very sensitive part of the body that people are inclined to take proper care of

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices

exact meaning unknown; possibly: = a grouping of large birds of prey with keen eyesight; ► unclean and therefore not to be eaten; ≈ associated with large size and great strength, ability to fly great distances at high speed; symbol of protection, metaphor for God, but also symbol for death in battle
= causative action by which someone causes someone else's inactivity to end so that he comes into action, ◄ as if he had been sleeping for a certain time
extension of mening of [a]: = group of young birds that are not yet or hardly mature enough to leave the security of their nest; ≈ associated with being vulnerable, in need of protection
= young of a bird
= action by which humans or animals spread out part of their body
= part of body; ◄ of bird, insect, celestial creature; ► used for flying but also to give protection
= state in which humans, animals, or objects are bearing a load while moving from one place to another
= part of body; ◄ of bird; ► used for flying but also for protecting its young; ≈ associated with safety and security
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= the state of being apart from significant others

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
= generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= state in which something is associated with a nation or country that is different from one's own
= causative action by which humans or deities make (other) humans ride on a domestic animal such as a donkey (חֲמֹור) or a horse (סוּס) in a chariot (מֶרְכָּבָה) or on a cart (עֲגָלָה)
literally: the back (of an area); hence: = the highest situated parts of a certain location, often representing the entire location

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object
literally: to nurse; hence: = causative action by which deities provide humans with goods
= sweet substance ◄ made either by bees, or from fruits such as dates, grapes or figs; ► much appreciated as food; ≈ associated with abundance and fertility

= high quality oil (שֶׁמֶן) ◄ extracted from the fruits of the olive tree during the first pressing; ► used as food, medicine, fuel, perfume (when mixed with spices), and other purposes; also used in various religious rituals; ≈ associated with joy, but also known for its softness, smoothness, and elusiveness
= hard stone; ◄ consisting of nearly pure silica; ≈ symbol of a strong will power
= mass of rock projecting and forming an elevation

= coagulated substance; ◄ formed by action of acids on milk; ► made into cheese (חָרִיץ) or eaten as food; ≈ regarded as choice food and therefore often associated with prosperity; because of the smoothness of this substance it is sometimes associated with flattery and untrustworthiness as well

= large ruminant animals with horns and cloven hoofs, ► chiefly domesticated for meat or milk, as beasts of burden, or for pulling a cart or a plow; it is a clean animal and can be eaten and sacrificed; ≈ regarded as a sign of wealth

= white fluid; ◄ secreted by women and female mammals; ► for nourishment of their children or young; also used as food for humans; ≈ highly appreciated and considered high quality food; associated with delight, whiteness, purity, wealth, and well being; metaphor for beauty, young age; quality, wealth, and sex

= group of small domestic animals traveling and feeding together; ◄ consisting of sheep and goats; ► hair or wool shorn for weaving into cloth; female milked for food; may be killed and eaten for meat; used as sacrificial animal; ≈ associated with large quantities and also with God's people, who are often seen as a flock with God as their shepherd
= fat parts ◄ of the body of animals and human beings; ► often the main ingredient of a sacrifice; ≈ regarded as the best part of the meat, but also associated with unresponsiveness and stubbornness
exact meaning unsure; probably: = a young male sheep

= male herbivorous mammal with four legs; ◄ |iovis ladicaudata|i*, fat tailed sheep; ► clean animal, used for sacrifice, source of meat, hides, wool, and horns; ≈ associated with strength and leadership

literally: children of a town, region, nation; hence: = people, animals, or products that are inhabitants of or originating from a place, town, region, or nation, ◄ as if they were the offspring of that place
= region; ◄ north east of the River Jordan (יַרְדֵּן) ► at one time ruled by king Og (עֹוג) later assigned to half of the tribe of Manasseh (מְנַשֶּׁה)
= dominant male goat in a צֹאן (צֹאן) ≈ associated with authority
= pertaining to being the best part of an object or the best among a range of objects

Node.gloss: (to be blessed with an abundance of the) finest grains of wheat
Node.definition: literally: fat of the kidneys of wheat; hence: = the best quality of grains of wheat
= cereal plant bearing dense four sided spike of grain; ◄ Triticum; ► important source of flour for bread; ≈ its color used to be regarded as the ideal color for the skin
= red liquid, ◄ compared to blood because of its color
= dark red alcoholic liquid in the middle of the fermentation stage; ◄ made out of pressed grapes; ► used as beverage; ≈ associated with well being

literally: to be fat; hence: = state in which humans or animals look healthy and strong ◄ as a result of an abundance of food; ≈ it is important to note that fatness is usually regarded as a good quality in the OT, even though the causes and consequences are not necessarily considered positive; sometimes, however, fatness is associated with dullness and unresponsiveness
= another name for Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) used in poetry
= action by which a human or animal strikes forcibly with the foot; ≈ associated with disobedience and rebellion

literally: to be fat; hence: = state in which humans or animals look healthy and strong ◄ as a result of an abundance of food; ≈ it is important to note that fatness is usually regarded as a good quality in the OT, even though the causes and consequences are not necessarily considered positive; sometimes, however, fatness is associated with dullness and unresponsiveness
= state in which objects are relatively thick; ≈ often associated with health and prosperity
= state in which animal are relatively fat; ≈ often associated with health and prosperity
= the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them
= action by which humans or deities treat (other) humans, deities or things that belong to God with disrespect
figurative extension of a rock as place of refuge: = deity that protects and provides refuge
= causative action by which humans or deities come to the rescue or protection (of humans in need) implying success
= process by which humans and deities provoke in someone else a sentiment of anger ◄ by lavishing one's attention on someone else rather than on that person
= state in which an object is considered as not belonging to a certain group of objects
= state in which an event is considered utterly wrong and detestable

Node.gloss: to trouble|to vex|to provoke to anger
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities cause other humans or deities to experience displeasure ◄ by their words or behavior

= the human activity of killing one or more animals as a religious sacrifice; usually part of the animal is offered to the deity and part is eaten by the worshipers; often accompanied by the burning of incense
= supernatural being, ≈ associated with pagan worship
= the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind
= state in which an object or event is different from other objects or events implied or identified in a certain context ◄ because of having recently been introduced
= indirect male progenitor
figurative extension of a rock as place of refuge: = deity that protects and provides refuge
literally: to cause to give birth; hence: = causative process by which things are brough into existence
with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= process by which humans and animals bring forth new offspring

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= state in which humans or deities are unwilling to engage in any way with (other) humans or deities, or with other objects and events, often caused by pride and contempt
= causative action by which humans cause (other) humans or deities to experience displeasure ◄ by their words or behavior
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

literally: to hide (one's) face (from someone); hence: = action by which a deity does not engage with people, and does not intervene neither in their favor nor to punish, ◄ as if he were enable to see them

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified
= pertaining to being the last part of an event, close to its moment of completion
= all of the people born and living at about the same time
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= state in which humans are considered worthy of trust, because they are truthful and committed, with an unwavering disposition, which is reflected in their actions
= process by which humans and deities provoke in someone else a sentiment of anger ◄ by lavishing one's attention on someone else rather than on that person
= generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

Node.gloss: to trouble|to vex|to provoke to anger
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities cause other humans or deities to experience displeasure ◄ by their words or behavior
= a deity who is unable to accomplish anything, ◄ compared to a light breeze
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= process by which humans and deities provoke in someone else a sentiment of anger ◄ by lavishing one's attention on someone else rather than on that person

= a large body of people united by common descent, religion, or language, inhabiting a particular state or territory, led by one common leader; often referring to the non Israelite nations, especially when used in plural
= foolish person who has no respect for God or his fellow human beings but thinks highly of himself

Node.gloss: to trouble|to vex|to provoke to anger
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities cause other humans or deities to experience displeasure ◄ by their words or behavior

= state of burning, in which substances combine chemically with oxygen from the air and give out bright light, heat, and smoke; ► used for cooking, melting, cleansing, heating, and destroying; ≈ many aspects of life are compared with fire, such as anger, jealousy, aggression, wickedness, words, life, certain sicknesses, suffering, etc.
= process by which a fire starts burning; ≈ used as a metaphor for anger
= state of extreme displeasure; ≈ often associated with fire and smoke
= state in which a fire (אֵשׁ) is burning up the combustible materials fueling it; ≈ associated with anger
particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

= abode of the dead, a place of darkness and silence, located deep in the earth and inaccessible, where there is neither compassion nor wisdom; ≈ regarded as a place that is never satisfied; often personified; going there before one's time is considered a punishment
= action by which people or objects are removed from existence in a violent way ◄ as food that is eaten

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= general term for plants that are sources of food; ≈ a sign of God's blessing
= the bottom part of a construction, which bears everything built on top of it; sometimes used in a somewhat figurative sense to denote the foundations of heaven and earth
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)
= state of hardship or difficulty in a circumstance, sometimes as the consequence of wicked behavior

= pointed missile, shot from a bow; slender and straight in shape and moving swiftly; ◄ made out of wood and/or iron; ► mainly used for hunting, in warfare, and occasionally for divination; ≈ symbol of aggression, affliction, and punishment
= literally: to finish; hence: = causative action by which humans and deities cause (other) humans and objects to completely disappear from existance
exact meaning unsure; probably: = state/process by which humans experience a condition of extreme weakness of the body
= state of having a lack of food for a period of time, affecting an individual for a short time or a large number of people in a geographical area for a prolonged time (as in famine)
literally: to be eaten; hence: = process by which humans die as a result of hunger and sickness
= a destructive and deadly condition which affects nature
= event that causes the end of a large number of people
often used as collective: = general term for any land animal, as opposed to humans (אָדָם) birds (עֹוף) reptiles (רֶמֶשׂ) insects (שֶׁרֶץ) and fish (דָּג)
= causative action by which deities commission one or more people to go to a certain individual or place to inflict punishment

= poisonous fluid; ◄ secreted by serpents, scorpions, etc. and introduced into body of victim by bite or sting; ► used by these animals to kill their prey and/or defend themselves against their natural enemies; ≈ often used to denote suffering and injury in a more general sense as well
= action by which a limbless animal moves itself forward on its belly
= the loose natural substance of the earth's surface
= referent to the location outside of an object
= action by which humans are engaged in an armed conflict with other humans, accompanied by deeds of aggression
= area enclosed by walls or partitions, floor, and ceiling; ◄ part of building
= state of strong fear because of an actual or perceived danger, such as aggression from the enemy, a dangerous animal, or death

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= a young, fully grown, unmarried male ► associated with joy and strength

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= young unmarried woman, who has never been married before, and has never had sex with a man
= a child that is still drinking milk from its mother's breasts

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

Node.gloss: to destroy|to wipe out|to strike down
Node.definition: exact meaning unsure; probably: = causative action by which humans take the life of other humans in a violent way
= human being; ◄ created by God; ≈ often associated with weakness, fragility, and mortality
= process in which information that is stored in one's mind regarding someone or something is being reprocessed continually and/or repeatedly
= marker indicating that if the event in focus would not have been true another event would not haven taken place
= causative action by which humans cause (other) humans or deities to experience displeasure ◄ by their words or behavior
= person who has a conflict with someone else and acts accordingly
= state in which humans experience a strong fear of other humans, deities, or animals
= state in which humans are unable to identify someone or evaluate a situation incorrectly
primarily used in poetry: = person that opposes other people and so is a cause of distress to others

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
literally: hand, used metonymically to denote the owner of the hand; hence: = the person who is the originator of a particular event
literally: raised hand; hence: = state in which humans act with confidence
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= action by which a person or deity carries out some purposeful activity, in order to create something or cause something to happen

= a large body of people united by common descent, religion, or language, inhabiting a particular state or territory, led by one common leader; often referring to the non Israelite nations, especially when used in plural

Node.gloss: to vanish|to disappear|to be lost|to perish|to be broken|to be destroyed|to be ruined
Node.definition: = process by which humans or objects disappear or are removed from existence;◄ either by (a usually unnatural) death, aggression, hardship, disaster, natural processes, acts of destruction, or direct divine intervention

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
= state whereby someone has the ability to see through the outward appearance of things and grasp their essence

Node.gloss: to be able|to be skillful|to be wise|to be intelligent
Node.definition: = state or process by which humans, deities, and animals possess or gain a certain level of wisdom, intelligence, or proficiency

Node.gloss: to consider|to ponder|to observe|to take note of|to have regard for|to give heed to|to study
Node.definition: = action by which humans think about someone or something accompanied by a willingness to translate their conclusions into action if needed

Node.gloss: to consider|to pay heed|to perceive|to realize|to understand|to distinguish
Node.definition: = process by which someone gains knowledge and understanding by observing carefully in order to see through the outward appearance of things and grasp their essence
= pertaining to being the last part of an event, close to its moment of completion

= referent to the way in which an event is performed; ► normally with the intention of finding out how, but often used in rhetorical questions in order to express one's conviction that that event in question cannot be performed at all (under the given circumstances)
= state in which a countable entity is one in number
= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times
= state in which a countable entity is two in number
= state in which a countable entity is ten thousand in number; ≈ associated with excessively high numbers by which the exact number is relatively unimportant
= set of particles linking two events and denoting that X will not takes place unless Y is true
figurative extension of a rock as place of refuge: = deity that protects and provides refuge
literally: to sell; hence: = causative action by which deities surrender their people to be controled by others
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= causative action of controling and restricting movement; that is, to hand over a person or an object to another's control
figurative extension of a rock as place of refuge: = deity that protects and provides refuge
figurative extension of a rock as place of refuge: = deity that protects and provides refuge
= person who has a conflict with someone else and acts accordingly

= a creeping plant that develops a woody stem when it matures; it grows along the ground until it finds a tree or other object to climb, using tendrils (שָׂרִיג) ◄ vitis vinifera; ► it bears clusters (אֶשְׁכֹּל) of grapes (עֲנָב) that are sweet and juicy and can be made into wine (יַיִן) ≈ a symbol of blessing, prosperity, and happiness

= a creeping plant that develops a woody stem when it matures; it grows along the ground until it finds a tree or other object to climb, using tendrils (שָׂרִיג) ◄ vitis vinifera; ► it bears clusters (אֶשְׁכֹּל) of grapes (עֲנָב) that are sweet and juicy and can be made into wine (יַיִן) ≈ a symbol of blessing, prosperity, and happiness
= town; ◄ located near Dead Sea (יָם־הַמֶּלַח) ► town where Lot (לֹוט) settled, when he separated himself from Abram (אַבְרָם) destroyed with Gomorrah (עֲמֹרָה)
= a piece of land generally uninhabited by human beings, ► sometimes used for farming or pasturing animals
= town; ◄ located near Dead Sea (יָם־הַמֶּלַח) ►destroyed with Sodom (סְדֹם)
= poisonous fluid, ◄ produced from poisonous plants or secreted by serpents; ≈ here used to denote suffering and injury
= group of flowers or fruits positioned on one stem
= bitter tasting herbs, ► eaten as part of the Passover (פֶּסַח) meal; ≈ associated with sadness and hardship

= dark red alcoholic liquid; ◄ made out of grapes through the process of fermentation; ► used as beverage, though to be avoided by Nazirites, and by priests when on duty; ≈ associated with joy and well being, but also with drunkenness and foolishness; used as metaphor for anger, aggressive behavior, and sex

= poisonous fluid; ◄ secreted by serpents, scorpions, etc. and introduced into body of victim by bite or sting; ► used by these animals to kill their prey and/or defend themselves against their natural enemies; ≈ often used to denote suffering and injury in a more general sense as well
= long legless reptile without eyelids or external ears; it moves by wriggling or gliding; some species have a poisonous bite; ≈ symbol of lurking, unexpected danger
= poisonous fluid, ◄ produced from poisonous plants or secreted by serpents; ≈ here used to denote suffering and injury

= snake with the ability to spread the ribs in the neck area, so as to form a broad, flat profile called the hood, which makes it look thicker than it really is; reaches two meters in length and 50 millimeters in diameter; it is dark brown with a yellowish underside; very poisonous; feeds on mice, gerbils, birds, bird eggs, lizards, frogs, and other snakes; ≈ associated with great danger
= pertaining to being without mercy towards humans and animals
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine

Node.gloss: to store up > to keep (in mind)
Node.definition: = process by which something is collected and deposited, ► for further use

Node.gloss: to seal off|to store in memory
Node.definition: literally: to put a seal on an event; hence: = action by which deities hide an event in their memory in order to process it later
= place(s) where one's valuable goods are store
= action in which humans or deities harm (other) humans in return for an injury or wrong, and so find relief from their anger
= a shorter or longer moment in the passage of time
= state in which an object is not firmly fixed to the surface on which it stands so that it can move or slip; to waver
literally: foot; hence: = pattern of behavior, with a primary focus on moral and ethical behavior, ◄ understood as a journey through life

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= extremely difficult circumstances ► resulting in grief, poverty, sickness, and/or death
= process by which an event happens quickly
exact meaning unsure: = pertaining to being destined to take place; ≈ associated with negative events such as disaster and destruction

Node.gloss: to judge|to pass judgment|to vindicate|to rule
Node.definition: = action by which someone gives a verdict on a case or person in a dispute and ensures that the verdict is implemented, which, ideally, results in relief for the innocent and punishment for the guilty; this can only be done by someone in authority, such as a judge or ruler or even God himself
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God
= action by which humans or deities seek to find satisfaction by taking revenge on the cause of their anger or grief

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
= to decrease in intensity until it is completely gone
literally: hand; hence: = action by which humans or deities exert strength and power
= state of non existence of a person, place or event
= causative action by which humans put other humans in a position by which they can no longer move at will
= state in which humans are not or no longer in a state of bondage

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= referent to an unknown location; ► normally used with the purpose of finding which location that is; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that such a location cannot be found
plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
figurative extension of a rock as place of refuge: = deity that protects and provides refuge

Node.gloss: to take refuge|to find refuge|to find shelter
Node.definition: = action by which humans and animals who find themselves in difficult circumstances go to a certain location, ► in order to find protection or safety
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= fat parts ◄ of the body of animals and human beings; ► often the main ingredient of a sacrifice; ≈ regarded as the best part of the meat, but also associated with unresponsiveness and stubbornness

= the human activity of killing one or more animals as a religious sacrifice; usually part of the animal is offered to the deity and part is eaten by the worshipers; often accompanied by the burning of incense
literally: to eat (an offering); hence: = process by which a deity receives a burnt offering; ≈ used of idols only

= dark red alcoholic liquid; ◄ made out of grapes through the process of fermentation; ► used as beverage, though to be avoided by Nazirites, and by priests when on duty; ≈ associated with joy and well being, but also with drunkenness and foolishness; used as metaphor for anger, aggressive behavior, and sex
= action by which humans pour out a liquid, such as wine (יַיִן) oil (שֶׁמֶן) or even blood (דָּם) before a deity ► as a sacrifice
= action by which humans or deities provide assistance or support to (other) humans ► in order to make their life, work, task or situation easier

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
= a reference to the actual time when a particular event takes place
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse

Node.gloss: to cause to die|to kill|to put to death
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans, animals, or deities cause (other) humans or animals to stop living

Node.gloss: to keep alive|to restore to life
Node.definition: = to cause an object to become or remain alive and well; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in most cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity
= action by which humans strike other humans or animals with a hammer, club or similar object, resulting in breaking the underlying bones
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse

= causative action by which humans or deities help or cause (other) humans to be restored to health or physical strength after a disease or an accident; this could also refer to the wound or disease itself

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
literally: hand; hence: = state of being in a position of control and authority over objects or people
= causative action by which humans or deities remove (other) humans or objects from a dangerous or life threatening situation
literally: to lift up (one's) hands; hence: = action by which someone takes an oath

= the area above the earth, the location of sun, moon, and stars, the realm of the birds and God's primary residence; seen as the source of dew, rain, hail, snow, thunder and lightning, and sometimes even food; associated with what is high and remote, created by God and bound to disappear one day

literally: to lift up (one's) hands; hence: = action by which deities make a solemn promise, invoking themselves as a witness by lack of a higher power, which, in the case of humans, is usually done while raising one's hand

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= state in which humans and deities are alive and well, ◄ which, for humans, requires the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place
= process by which an object reflects light, often because it has been polished
= offensive weapon consisting of long blade for cutting or thrusting or both, and hilt with hand guard; ◄ made out of iron; ► used in warfare; ≈ symbol of aggression and punishment

Node.gloss: to hold on (to a type of behavior)
Node.definition: literally: to hold on to a quality as if it were a person; hence: = to act in accordance with a certain quality
= action by which humans or deities carry out a verdict pronounced against an individual or group
literally: hand, used metonymically to denote the owner of the hand; hence: = the person who is the originator of a particular event
literally: to bring back vengeance; hence: = causative action by which deities find relief from their anger by inflicting punishment
= action in which humans or deities harm (other) humans in return for an injury or wrong, and so find relief from their anger
primarily used in poetry: = person that opposes other people and so is a cause of distress to others
= person who experiences hostily towards someone else and acts accordingly

= causative action by which humans or deities cause (other) humans to be intoxicated ◄ by making them drink too much alcohol; ≈ associated with large quantities and sometimes extended to inanimate objects

= pointed missile, shot from a bow; slender and straight in shape and moving swiftly; ◄ made out of wood and/or iron; ► mainly used for hunting, in warfare, and occasionally for divination; ≈ symbol of aggression, affliction, and punishment

= red liquid that circulates in the arteries and veins of humans and animals; ► used in rituals such as sacrifices, purification and covenant ceremonies, and never to be eaten; ≈ regarded as the seat of life (נֶפֶשׁ) human blood, when flowing from the body, pollutes the body and the land
= offensive weapon consisting of long blade for cutting or thrusting or both, and hilt with hand guard; ◄ made out of iron; ► used in warfare; ≈ symbol of aggression and punishment
= action by which people or objects are removed from existence in a violent way ◄ as food that is eaten
= the soft substance in the body of humans and animals that consists of muscle tissue and fat

= red liquid that circulates in the arteries and veins of humans and animals; ► used in rituals such as sacrifices, purification and covenant ceremonies, and never to be eaten; ≈ regarded as the seat of life (נֶפֶשׁ) human blood, when flowing from the body, pollutes the body and the land
= state in which humans or animal are fatally wounded with a sharp object
= a group of people that have been forcibly carried off to prison, into slavery, or exile
literally: head; hence: = the person in leadership of a group of people, or, by extension, the most important object among a set of objects
= person who has a conflict with someone else and acts accordingly

= a large body of people united by common descent, religion, or language, inhabiting a particular state or territory, led by one common leader; often referring to the non Israelite nations, especially when used in plural
= causative action by which humans kill other humans in a violent way, usually involving the shedding of blood, which brings guilt upon the people committing these acts

= man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God
= action in which humans or deities harm (other) humans in return for an injury or wrong, and so find relief from their anger
= action in which humans or deities harm (other) humans in return for an injury or wrong, and so find relief from their anger
literally: to bring back vengeance; hence: = causative action by which deities find relief from their anger by inflicting punishment
primarily used in poetry: = person that opposes other people and so is a cause of distress to others
= causative action by which deities remove uncleanness and guilt from places and peoples

= the surface of the earth, containing the substance that God used to create animals and humans, and to which they return when they die; on this surface plants and trees grow, humans labor to grow crops and worship God, who sustains all life, but who can also strike it with a curse so that nothing grows again
= man; ◄ son of Amram (עַמְרָם) and Jochebed (יֹוכֶבֶד) younger brother of Miriam (מִרְיָם) and Aaron (אַהֲרֹן) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► leader of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) during exodus

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used for hearing; also a common place to wear jewelry
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine

= man, also known as Joshua (יְהֹושֻׁעַ) and Jeshua (יֵשׁוּעַ) ◄ son of Nun (נוּן) tribe of Ephraim (אֶפְרַיִם) ► one of the twelve men sent by Moses (מֹשֶׁה) to spy out the land; his original name was Hoshea, which was later changed by Moses to Joshua; he was Moses' assistant, who later became his successor and brought Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) into Canaan (כְּנַעַן)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ son of Elishama (אֱלִישָׁמָע) tribe of Ephraim (אֶפְרַיִם) ► father of Hoshea (הֹושֵׁעַ) who is better known as Joshua (יְהֹושׁוּעַ)
= causative action by which deities, humans, or animals bring an activity to full completion
= man; ◄ son of Amram (עַמְרָם) and Jochebed (יֹוכֶבֶד) younger brother of Miriam (מִרְיָם) and Aaron (אַהֲרֹן) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► leader of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) during exodus

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

Node.gloss: to take to heart|to be concerned about
Node.definition: literally: to put (one's) heart on (something); hence: = to process information in one's mind, often with the intention to act upon it later
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= action by which a person or deity informs someone with a favorable or unfavorable message about something about to happen

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= a linker indicating that one proposition is the purpose or result or another

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

Node.gloss: to be careful|to make sure|to take precautions
Node.definition: = action by which humans ensure their own well being by being watchful, by making sure that certain instructions are carried out, or by refraining from certain activities

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= causative action by which humans or deities offer instruction to (other) humans, ► aimed to teach the recipients wisdom and good behavior
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine

= the state of being alive and well; ◄ because of the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity

Node.gloss: to prolong (days) > to stay long|to linger|to last|to live on
Node.definition: literally: to prolong (days); hence: = to stay (in a certain location or position) for an extended period of time
literally: days; hence: = an unspecified amount of time

= the surface of the earth, containing the substance that God used to create animals and humans, and to which they return when they die; on this surface plants and trees grow, humans labor to grow crops and worship God, who sustains all life, but who can also strike it with a curse so that nothing grows again
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= referent to a group of male (and female) participants that are addressed if a discourse

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= river; ◄ flowing from Mount Hermon (חֶרְמֹון) in a southerly direction through the Sea of Galilee (כִּנֶּרֶת) into the Dead Sea (יָם־הַמֶּלַח)
= action by which humans take ownership of land and other possessions

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= man; ◄ son of Amram (עַמְרָם) and Jochebed (יֹוכֶבֶד) younger brother of Miriam (מִרְיָם) and Aaron (אַהֲרֹן) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► leader of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) during exodus

= a marker drawing the reader's attention to the object or event directly following it and identifying it with emphasis as the object or event in focus, as opposed to other, similar objects and events

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

Node.gloss: to go up|to climb up|to mount
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals or objects go to a place that is situated at a higher elevation, by foot, carried by hand, or with the help of a vehicle
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)
= range of mountains; ◄ located in Moab (מֹואָב) northeast of the Dead Sea (יָם־הַמֶּלַח)
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)
= mountain; ◄ in Moab (מֹואָב) ► place where Moses (מֹשֶׁה) had a view of the promised land before he died
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= a nation and its territory; ◄ situated E. of Dead Sea (יָם־הַמֶּלַח) regarded as founded by a son of Lot (לֹוט)
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= town; ◄ located northwest of the Dead Sea (יָם־הַמֶּלַח) territory of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► first town conquered by Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) after they entered Canaan (כְּנַעַן)

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= the region inhabited by people who were regarded as descendants of Canaan, son of Ham (חָם) son of Noah (נֹחַ) settled by Abram (אַבְרָם)
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= state of ownership of land, including any buildings and population centers located on it, or slaves
= process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse

Node.gloss: to go up|to climb up|to mount
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals or objects go to a place that is situated at a higher elevation, by foot, carried by hand, or with the help of a vehicle
literally: to return; hence: = to die and rejoin one's ancestors
= a linker introducing a propostion that contains the content of what precedes
= process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression
= man; ◄ son of Amram (עַמְרָם) and Jochebed (יֹוכֶבֶד) brother of Moses (מֹשֶׁה) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► first high priest (כֹּהֵן)
= son of one's father, whether from the same mother or not
= mountain; ◄ on Edomite (אֱדֹום) border; ► location where Aaron (אַהֲרֹן) died
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)
literally: to return; hence: = to die and rejoin one's ancestors
= a linker introducing a proposition denoting the reason for what precedes

Node.gloss: to commit a violation|to be unfaithful
Node.definition: = to do something that is not in line with the behavior that one has committed oneself to
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

= town, also known as En Mishpat (עֵין מִשְׁפָּט) , Kedesh (קֶדֶשׁ) and Kadesh Barnea (קָדֵשׁ בַּרְנֵעַ) ◄ located in the Wilderness of Zin (צִן) in the northern part of Sinai (סִינַי) peninsula; ► Israelites (יִשְׂרָאֵל) encamped there on their way from Egypt (מִצְרַיִם) to Canaan (כְּנַעַן) it is also the location of the Meribah (מְרִיבָה) spring; spies were sent out into Canaan from this place; it later marked the southern border of the territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה)
= area not very suitable for sedentary life and agriculture because of its lack of water; suitable for grazing domestic animals and only inhabited by nomadic tribes and wild animals
= a wilderness area in the Negev (נֶגֶב) on the southern border of Canaan (כְּנַעַן) near Kadesh Barnea (קָדֵשׁ בַּרְנֵעַ)
= a linker introducing a proposition denoting the reason for what precedes
= action by which humans acknowledge the holiness of God and certain times of the year that are important to him, and act accordingly

= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
